TopicTitle: the "Load" button in VAB and SPH are unresponsive.

Articles.Content: If I try to load a craft in either the VAB or SPH nothing happens, the "load" button is simply unresponsive. Can someone help please? I dont have any mods or any cheats installed.

Do you have klf installed? I've had a bug where I think I hit f7 to make the windows invisible and it thinks my cursor is still on the window no matter where I move it, and so the VAB buttons are greyd out and unresponsive

Do you have klf installed? I've had a bug where I think I hit f7 to make the windows invisible and it thinks my cursor is still on the window no matter where I move it, and so the VAB buttons are greyd out and unresponsive

No, I dont have Klf. No mods. Also I can still click on the Load button, it just doesnt do anything.
Have you accidentally deleted or moved your Ships folder? Either in the specific save's folder or in your KSP folder (stock ships).

If you have something funky in one of the craft files it can cause this. I just recently ran into it myself, where the game spawned an empty craft file, which prevented any ships from being loaded.

Try backing up your VAB folder then deleting all the craft files within the original. If the game then loads the list of ships properly try transfering them back in one at a time to see which is acting up.
I was having this same problem, but was afraid to ask for help because my install wasn't completely stock. The same solution worked, though, so thanks!
